name: Buffalo Run: Endless Running In Eid Mandi at Top Speed or Get Slaughtered by Butcher
name_original: Buffalo Run: Endless Running In Eid Mandi at Top Speed or Get Slaughtered by Butcher
description:
This season’s most wanted cow is on the loose from the market, and a bunch of butchers are after her.

Get an exciting endless runner, as our beloved cow gets ready for a wild run through the butcher Mandi, trying an escape from the local slaughters. But the Mandi is not a place where most can get out of alive. Our precious cow will have to make a run for her life and run fast and free of their capture.


Avoid obstacles during the run and keep running for as long as you can, make those butchers have a run for their money this Eid, or you become this Eid’s most prized sacrifice.


GAMEPLAY

Use gyroscopic controls of your device to strafe your cow sideways by tilting. Keep running for as long as you can and avoid incoming people and other obstacles. Upon fumbling, the butchers will grow near you and try to grab you. Too many mistakes and its “Allahu Akbar” for you.


FEATURES

- Eid themed Cow endless runner
- Exciting animal market environment
- Collect coins along the way and set records for most distance run
